DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). This study compares the effectiveness and safety of NovoSeven® to FEIBA (FEIBA VH) in haemophilia patients with inhibitors being treated for joint bleeds.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of NovoSeven® in Haemophilia - Joint Bleeds
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of hemophilia A or B with inhibitors to factor VIII or IX, respectively
